content.rendered:
Operator/Translator | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full time Monday-Friday 8am-5pm
  • Candidate will serve as the main point of contact for phone calls
  • Will assist a high volume of calls including Spanish speaking patients
  • Must have a good customer service or medical front office background
  • Bilingual (Spanish) a plus
  • $10-$11/hour
